text: Gert Brauer (September 7, 1955 â€“ January 1, 2018) was an East German footballer. He played 270 Oberliga matches in East Germany. He was born in Ronneburg, East Germany (nowadays in Thuringia). Three of his four international matches for East Germany where part of the UEFA Euro 1980 qualifying. ==References== ==Other websites== * Gert Brauer Category:1955 births Category:2018 deaths Category:East German sportspeople Category:German footballers Category:Sportspeople from Thuringia
